com.citytechinc.cq.component.dialog.maker
Interface WidgetMaker

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWidgetMaker, CheckBoxWidgetMaker, DateFieldWidgetMaker, DateTimeWidgetMaker, DefaultWidgetMaker, DialogFieldSetWidgetMaker, HiddenWidgetMaker, Html5SmartFileWidgetMaker, Html5SmartImageWidgetMaker, MultifieldWidgetMaker, NumberFieldWidgetMaker, PathFieldWidgetMaker, RichTextEditorMaker, SelectionWidgetMaker, SizeFieldWidgetMaker, TagInputFieldWidgetMaker
public interface WidgetMaker

A WidgetMaker is a class which is intended to create a single Widget based on an annotated Field in a Component Class. Such a Maker will return an object implementing DialogElement suitable for addition into a Dialog. Widget Makers are tied to concrete widget types by way of a Widget annotation.
